name: fusion-tables-archive-visualizer
description: Visualize archived Fusion Tables from Google Drive
author: Ubilabs

scripts.build: yarn run clean && parcel build ./src/index.html && npm run prepend:header:js
scripts.build:deploy: yarn run clean && parcel build --public-url /fusion-tables-export.appspot.com/ ./src/index.html && npm run prepend:header:js
scripts.prepend:header:js: for file in dist/*.js; do cat src/license-header.txt $file > /tmp/out && mv /tmp/out $file; done
scripts.upload: gsutil -m cp -r -a public-read dist/* gs://fusion-tables-export.appspot.com/ && gsutil setmeta -h "Content-Type:text/html" -h "Cache-Control:max-age=0, no-transform" gs://fusion-tables-export.appspot.com/*.html && gsutil setmeta -h "Content-Type:application/javascript" -h "Cache-Control:max-age=31536000, immutable" gs://fusion-tables-export.appspot.com/*.js
scripts.deploy: yarn run test && yarn run build:deploy && yarn run upload
